alert.note: Alert for Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 3:43PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Madison and central Beaverhead Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 342 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms extending from 18 miles south of Divide to near Dillon to 33 miles southeast of Jackson. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Beaverhead Rock State Park and Glen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
